Detailed Description

Offers a dialog to set several items in the config.

If you only specify a wxCANCEL button, the dialog is readonly. You can also use the dialog modeless (then you can use wxAPPLY to store the items in the config). When pressing the apply button OnCommandConfigDialog is invoked from wxExFrame.

Constructor, specify the vector of config items to be used.

When wxOK or wxAPPLY is pressed, any change in one of the config items is saved in the config.

If you specified some checkboxes, calling this method requires that one of them should be checked for the OK button to be enabled.
